channel.title: Mi 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Mi 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.0.2.0.QJIEUXM Fastboot update for Mi 10 Lite EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 10 Lite EEA

Codename: monet

Version: V12.0.2.0.QJIEUXM | 10.0

Size: 4.4 GB

MD5: 6d031df2c3e3829da4e0141a301720b7

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to August 2020. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
Optimization: Special effects for fingerprint scanner
[Camera]
New: New filters: Black ice and Lime

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.QJIMIXM Fastboot update for Mi 10 Lite Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 10 Lite Global

Codename: monet

Version: V12.0.1.0.QJIMIXM | 10.0

Size: 4.3 GB

MD5: b9bd9f8dfc57900e4adfdabf69853749

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Animations in selected scenes
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
New: When Notification shade is open, swipe down from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: Control center is now closed by incoming calls
Optimization: Press and hold redirection options
Fix: Control center wasn't always displayed correctly in landscape mode
[Dark mode]
Optimization: Brightness and color improvements for wallpapers in Dark mode
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to August 2020. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
Optimization: Special effects for fingerprint scanner
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Screen lights up with an animation now
New: Status bar color gradient animation
[Camera]
New: A new mode for scanning documents
New: New filters: Black ice and Lime
New: Movie frame

Download: Here
